2. Calculate expected platform fee: 82,049.29 GALA (5%)
3. Verify actual fee matches calculation
Expected Results: Platform fee should be exactly 82,049.29 GALA (5% of 1,640,985.84)

Test Steps:
1. Calculate total graduation pool value
2. Subtract creator reward (17,777 GALA) and platform fee (5%)
3. Verify remaining 94% goes to DEX pool
Expected Results: DEX pool should receive exactly 94% of graduation funds for liquidity

Test Steps:
1. From graduation pool of 1,640,985.84 GALA
2. Subtract creator reward (17,777) and platform fee (82,049.29)
3. Verify DEX pool gets 1,541,159.55 GALA
Expected Results: DEX pool should receive exactly 1,541,159.55 GALA (94% minus creator reward)
